#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int N;
char** A;
int size;
//int s,l,r;
//void mergeSort(A[)
void buildHeap(int i)
{
     char* temp;
     if(i>0)
     while((strcmp(A[i], A[(i-1)/2]) < 0))
     {
                      temp= A[i];
                      A[i]= A[(i-1)/2];
                      A[(i-1)/2]= temp;
                      i=(i-1)/2;
     } 
     size++;
}

void heapify(int i)
{
   //  cout<<"Test 1"<<endl;
     char* temp= A[i];
     int s= i;
     int l= 2*i + 1;
     int r= 2*i+ 2;
     if(l< size)
     {
     //      cout<<"l< size"<<endl;
     if((strcmp(A[i], A[l]) > 0))
     {
       //              cout<<"A[i]> A[l]"<<endl;
                     s= l;
                    if(r< size)
                    {
         //                 cout<<"r < size"<<endl;
                    if(strcmp(A[l], A[r])>  0)
                    {
         //                           cout<<"A[l]> A[r]"<<endl;
                                        s= r;
                    }
                    else
                    {
           //             cout<<"A[r]> A[l]"<<endl;
                                        s= l;
                    }
                    }
     }
     else if(r< size)
     {
      //    cout<<"r < size"<<endl;
     if(strcmp(A[i], A[r])> 0)
     {
                     
     //cout<<"A[i]> A[r]"<<endl;
          s= r;
     }
     }
     if(s != i)
     {
          temp= A[s];
          A[s]= A[i];
          A[i]= temp;
       //   cout<<"Heapify "<<(i)<<endl;
          heapify(s);
     }
     }
}

char* extractMax()
{
      //cout<<"Inside Max1"<<endl;
      char* temp= A[0];
      //cout<<"Inside Max2"<<endl;
      A[0]= A[--size];
      //cout<<"Inside Max3"<<endl;
      //size--;
      //cout<<"Inside Max4"<<endl;
      //cout<<A[0]<<endl;
      //cout<<"Inside Max5"<<endl;
      heapify(0);
      //cout<<"Inside Max6"<<endl;
      return temp;
}

int main()
{
    /*char* s1= new char[10];
    s1= "Rahul";
    string s2= s1;
    cout<<s1<<endl;
   /* char s1[]= "Rahul";
    char s2[]= "Rahul";
    char s3[]= "Nikhil";
    int diff= strcmp(s1, s2);
    cout<<diff<<endl;
    
    //int N;
    s= 0;
    l= 0;
    r= 0;*/
    string s1, s2;
    size= 0;
    cin>>N;
    A= new char*[N];
    for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
    {
            A[i]= new char[100];
            cin>>A[i];
            buildHeap(i);
    }
    int max= 0;
    int count= 0;
    s1= extractMax();
    //s2 = s1;
    int l1= s1.length();
    int l2;
    int min;
    for(int i=0; i<N-1; i++)
    {
            s2= extractMax();
            l2= s2.length();
            if(l1< l2)
            min=l1;
            else
            min= l2;
            count= 0;
            for(int j=0; j<min; j++)
            {
                    if(s1[j] == s2[j])
                    count++;
                    else
                    break;
            }
            if (count> max)
            max= count;
            s1= s2;
            l1= l2;
    }
    //cout<<extractMax()<<endl;
    /*for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
    {
            cout<<A[i]<<endl;
    }*/
    cout<<max<<endl;
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
